2.verse: Behold, I will make you small among the nations;

3.verse: The pride of your heart has deceived you,

4.verse: Though you soar aloft like the eagle,

7.verse: All your allies have driven you to your border;

8.verse: Will I not on that day, declares the Lord ,

9.verse: And your mighty men shall be dismayed, O Teman,

10.verse: Because of the violence done to your brother Jacob,

11.verse: On the day that you stood aloof,

12.verse: But do not gloat over the day of your brother

13.verse: Do not enter the gate of my people

14.verse: Do not stand at the crossroads

15.verse: For the day of the Lord is near upon all the nations.

16.verse: For as you have drunk on my holy mountain,

17.verse: But in Mount Zion there shall be those who escape,

18.verse: The house of Jacob shall be a fire,

19.verse: Those of the Negeb shall possess Mount Esau,

20.verse: The exiles of this host of the people of Israel

21.verse: Saviors shall go up to Mount Zion
